QuestData.Title: Curse of Jani
QuestData.Description: Thief and killer, know dat ya be standin' before da Patron of Scavengers, da Lord of Thieves, da God of Garbage, Master of Minions, and da Keeper of Secrets.$b$bYa be standin' before me in raiment worth entire kingdoms of gold, bearin' weapons dat cost more than even me most devout and renowned followers will ever earn.$b$bI tink now be a good time ta teach ya a lesson. Maybe show ya high and mighty greatness what it means ta be snappin' in da gutters.
